column8:
This t-shirt is in admiration of the producer Lee 'Scratch' Perry.

 

If you don't know who Lee 'Scratch' Perry is, where the hell have you been?

 


Prolific doesn't describe the phenomenal output of the Father of Dub and Reggae, Rainford Hugh Perry. Still going strong at 76 he is undoubtedly one of the greatest contributors to music since forever, while showing no signs of slowing down. As musician, producer, and instigator of a vast array of collaborations he has created a truly spectacular musical and cultural legacy.

 


His latest offering is a collaboration with the kings of Ambient House, The Orb, in the form of The Orbserver in the Star House. Buy it now and while your at it purchase either/both of these two Lee 'Scratch' Perry t-shirts featuring the atmospheric photograhpy of Djim Masrangar, who captures the wonderful eccentricity and charisma of The Upsetter perfectly.
